message: Hello Bob, I have an amazing product that I think you'll love. I'm looking for $200 to let it go.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $200 is way out of my budget. I'm only willing to pay $80 for this product.
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $80. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $160. Would you be interested in that price?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $160 is still too high for me. How about we split the difference and I pay $120?
I'm still a bit hesitant to go as low as $120, Bob. I'm willing to compromise at $140, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?

Alice, I really appreciate your willingness to come down, but $140 is still a bit out of my range.  I'm sticking with my offer of $120.  If you can't come down to that, I'm going to have to go with John's offer.
